3.「この 並々ならぬ破邪舟師のチカラは……。| <pc>さま。| こちらの お方は: I feel a power of an extraordinary|Sacred Sailor... Hey, <pc>.|Who is this guy?

4.「ええっ！？ この お方が| 伝説の破邪舟師 父祖エルジュ……| 私の 遠いご先: Wha?! You're sayin' this is the legendary|Erju?! He's my ancestor dat goes way,|way back...

5.「本来…なら ボクが 行くべき……| な…のに……。すまない……。: It should... be me who's going, but... I...|I'm sorry...

7.「……あ…の レイダメテス……| 邪悪な…オーラを 見た…だろ……。| 以前とは: That... Reidametes... I feel a... sinister|aura... It's nothing like... it once was...

9.「……ありがとうございます エルジュさま。| どうか ここで 待っていてください: Thanks a ton, Erju. Please wait here for a|bit.

11.「いかがです？ エルジュさま。| なかなかモダンな| おもむきで ございましょう: Well, whaddya think, Erju? It's got quite da|modern look, don't it?

12.「うん。なかなか…いいね……。| さぁ <pc>……| レイダメテスへ……！: Yeah... it's pretty good...|<pc>... you must go to Reidametes!

14.「……申し訳ございません。| 私のチカラが 足りないばかりに。: I'm really sorry... Seems like my power just|ain't enough.

16.「だが 何か方法は あるはずだ。| でなければ この世界は……！: But we have to find a way. If we don't, then|this world will....

18.「幼い頃 我が師から 聞いたことがあります。| 破邪舟を強化する秘術について|: When I was little, my master told me|somethin'. He said he talked with an alchemist|about a technique to power up da Sacred Ship.

19.「……破邪舟を 強化する秘術だと！| それは どんな術なんだっ！？: A technique to power up the Sacred Ship?!|What is this technique?!

20.「そ その……| まだ 幼い頃でしたので くわしくは……。| 我が師なら 覚えて: W-well... I was pretty young, so I don't|remember much... my master would probably|remember, though.

21.「我が師であり 私の 祖母でもある| 先代の破邪舟師 ハルッカは| ウェナ諸島: My master and grandma Haruka was a former|Sacred Sailor... she lives in Verinard Kingdom...

23.「……ヴェリナード王国の| ヴェリナード城下町に 住んでいます。| 祖母を 訪ね: She lives in Verinard Castle Town. Please go|and see her, won't ya?

24.「それにしても 父祖エルジュさまは| どこか お身体でも悪いのでしょうか。: Still... it seems like there's still somethin'|wrong with Erju...

25.「たしか エルジュさまは 若くして| 不治の病で 命を落とされたとか……。| ど: I heard dat Erju died at a young age due to|some incurable disease... I'm pretty worried.

26.「<pc>さま。| どうか あの方を お願いいたします。: Please take care of him, won't you,|<pc>?

27.「……なんだい。| 今日は 千客万来だねえ。: What is it now...? Quite a lot of visitors|today...

28.「破邪舟師 ハルッカの家は ここか！？| ハルッカ お前に 頼みがある！: Is this where the Ship Shaper Haruka lives?!|Haruka, I have a favor I must ask of you!

29.「人の家に あいさつもナシに入ってきて| おふくろを 呼び捨てかよ。| アンタ: You just barge into our house and then demand|my mother do something for you? Who the hell|do you think you are?

30.「……失礼。ボクは 破邪舟師エルジュ。| そこにいる <pc>と ともに| 冥王: Excuse me... I am the Ship Shaper Erju. I came|here with <pc>, as we are trying|to defeat Netherlord Nergel.

31.「お前は フルッカの師なんだろう。| ボクたちに チカラを 貸してほしい。| 破: You're Fluka's master, aren't you? We really|need your help. Please teach me the technique|to strengthen the Sacred Ship!

32.「……なるほど その とてつもないチカラ。| 我等の父祖 伝説の破邪舟師エルジュ: I see... what a tremendous power. You must no|doubt be the legendary Ship Shaper|Erju himself.

33.「だが……その術は| 大昔に 失われちまったのさ。: However... that technique was lost a very|long time ago.

35.「あれは アタシが 新婚ホヤホヤの頃さ。| とある錬金術師の協力を得て アタシは: It was around the time I got married. With an|alchemist's help, I devised a secret technique|to bolster the Sacred Ship.

36.「あの ヒゲオヤジ。見た目によらず| たいしたウデ前でね。ヤツのレシピが| 破邪: That scruffy old man... despite his looks,|he's quite skillful. His recipe gave the|Sacred Ship new powers.

37.「ただ ちょうど 同じ頃に| コイツを身ごもったもんだから| しばらく それどこ: However, since I was pregnant with him around|the same time, I didn't have too much time|for that.

38.「ようやく 子どもの手が離れて| 錬金術師を たずねたところ| 取り返しのつかな: Once caring for my child was in order, I|visited that alchemist again... however, the|situation had become dire.

40.「アイツの家を 何者かが 襲ったらしくてね。| 家の中は めちゃくちゃ。| 錬金: Someone had attacked his house and burned|everything to the ground. All of the recipes|sadly went with it.

41.「錬金術師本人も 大怪我を負って 意識不明。| その上 娘の話によれば それ以前:
That alchemist was badly hurt and knocked|unconscious. Besides, according to his|daughter, he'd lost his alchemist ability even|
|before that.

42.「……たとえ 怪我が治ったって| 錬金術師のチカラが 戻らない以上| どうにも: Even though he recovered, if he has no|alchemist ability left... there's nothing he'd|be able to do.

43.「破邪舟のレシピの件は それっきり| 忘れるしかなかったのさ……。: I never saw that recipe again, so I eventually|just forgot all about it...

45.「出発前に 師から教わった あの術を| 試してみるべきかもしれない……。: Perhaps I should try that technique my master|taught me before I came here...

46.「<pc>。| 君の 時渡りのチカラと| ボクの破邪舟で ６０年前に 行こう。: <pc>. Let's go back in time 60|years with your time traveling power and|my Sacred Ship.

48.「……我が師によれば 強き絆で結ばれた| 時渡りの使い手と 破邪舟師ならば ごく:
According to my master, if there is a strong|bond between a time traveler and a Ship|Shaper, it is possible to time travel in a|
|Sacred Ship for a brief period of time.

49.「その 錬金術師が 大怪我をする前……| ６０年前に 時渡りすれば| 破邪舟を強: If we travel back in time 60 years to the|point right before that alchemist is|injured... I'm sure we can get that recipe.

50.「ハルッカ……その錬金術師が| 住んでいたのは どこなんだ？: Haruka... can you tell me where that alchemist|used to live?

51.「あ…ああ！| ナルビアの町さ！ 錬金術師イッショウは| ひとり娘と ナルビアに: Ah! That's right! It was Nalbia Town! That|alchemist Issho lived there with his only|daughter!

53.「さあ！ ボクの真似をして。| 君の 時渡りのチカラを……！: Now! Follow my lead. Show me your power of|time travel!

54.「こんなことが 破邪舟に| 可能だなんて……！？: To think this was possible with the Sacred|Ship...!

55.「……行こう！| ６０年前の ナルビアの町へ！: Let's go! To Nalbia Town, 60 years ago!

61.「ふぅーっ 助かったぜ……。| ところで お前らは 何者なんだ？: Whew... you saved me...|Who are you guys, anyway?

69.「お前の病ってえのは 何日も 高熱が続いて| 身体のチカラが 抜けるんだろ。: Your illness is a high fever that lasts for|days and leaves your body completely|exhausted, right?

70.「ここにいる オレの娘 リリオルも| お前と同じ病気……| メラゾ熱に かかって: Lyriol here had the same thing happen to her.|It's called Mellazo Fever.

I immediately recognized it since I had the|same symptoms as you. But someone named| alchemized a remedy for me,|
|and I'm completely cured!

75.「……メラゾ熱は 恐ろしい病だ。| だが この 特効薬のおかげで| 今後は 多く: Mellazo Fever is a horrible illness... but|thanks to that medicine, many people won't|have to suffer from it anymore.
